name: Writgo Affiliate Theme
author: Writgo
description: Professioneel WordPress affiliate thema met uitgebreide SEO tools, performance optimalisaties en mobiele optimalisaties.
changelog:
v7.6.0 - SEO & Performance Update

  • SEO Meta Box: Custom SEO titel, meta description, focus keyword per post
  • Content Analyse: Keyword density, leesbaarheid (Flesch-Douma), woorden/zinnen tellen
  • Schema Markup: 9+ schema types (Article, Review, FAQ, HowTo, Video, etc.)
  • XML Sitemaps: Automatische sitemap generatie
  • llms.txt: AI crawler ondersteuning
  • Redirect Manager: 301/302 redirects beheren
  • Interne Links: Automatische interne link suggesties
  • Affiliate Links: Link cloaking, click tracking, auto-linking
  • Shortcodes: Comparison table, pros/cons box, product box
  • Performance: Lazy loading, WebP support, resource hints, critical CSS
  • Caching: Browser caching headers, GZIP configuratie
  • Mobiel: iOS zoom fix, safe area insets, touch optimalisatie
  • Hamburger Menu: Volledig functioneel mobiel menu
